scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p public/javascripts && mkdir -p public/stylesheets && mkdir -p src/js
scripts.babelify: $(npm bin)/browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-1 ] ] -p licensify ./src/jsx/main.jsx -d -o ./src/js/bundle.js
scripts.start: $(npm bin)/beefy src/jsx/main.jsx:javascripts/main.js --live --open --cwd public -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-1 ] ]
scripts.clean: rm -rf public/javascripts/* && rm -rf public/stylesheets/* && rm -rf public/index.html && rm -rf src/js
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:html && npm run webpack && npm run minify:js && rm -rf src/js
